oai_dc:dc.dc:descriptions: Remarks concerning copies of Bushman Paintings, given by Colonel Durnfold to His Excellency Sir Bartle Frere. By |han kass'o. (L VIII.
7993, 23. 7995 8004). |han kass'o describes a copy of rock painting no. 8., in which there is a depiction of a rain
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Notes on rock painting copy no. 8: the rain and the rain
bull
